title: Mark Zuckerberg apologized. Now he has to fix Facebook
description: When the active MK11 character's health reaches zero, instead of being knocked out, Sub-Zero replaces them with an ice clone (similar to Sub-Zero/Grandmaster) which explodes afterwards, not only dealing minor damage and inflicting bleed on the current opponent, but also restoring about 10% of that character's max health
